```{r}
library(RWeka)
```

**PART 1**

Reading data.

```{r}
sonar = read.csv("sonar.all-data", header=FALSE)

dim(sonar)
str(sonar)
summary(sonar)

head(sonar)
```

**PART 2**

Using C4.5 decision tree.

```{r}
classifier <- J48(V61 ~ ., data = sonar)

classifier
summary(classifier)
table(sonar$V61, predict(classifier))
```
